1.q: Can I upgrade and downgrade my plan at any time
1.a: Of course you can! Go to the account page for more details.

2.q: Do I need a credit card to sign up
2.a: No. You only need a credit card if you upgrade to the paid plan.

3.q: Do you offer free student accounts
3.a: We sure do. Please submit a support ticket to request one.

4.a: You can cancel your account by going to the account page and clicking "Delete Account". If you are on the paid plan, you will need to downgrade to the free plan first.

5.a:
We currently support Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox 4, Apple Safari, Opera, and Internet Explorer 9. We suggest Google Chrome because it's fast :)
Note: Please make sure to keep your browser up to date. We only support the latest versions of the browsers specified.

6.q: How can I help improve Sketch Lab
6.a: Thank you for your interest in Sketch Lab! Please see the Contributing page for instructions.

7.a: You can download your sketches as PDF documents or as PNG or JPEG images. See this tutorial for more information.

8.q: How often do you back up my data
8.a: We backup our database daily, so your data is safe.
